name: UltimateKollywoodQuiz
0:
”Alexa, open Ultimate Kollywood Quiz”
”Alexa, start Ultimate Kollywood Quiz”
”Alexa, Launch Ultimate Kollywood Quiz”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ultimate kollywood quiz
des:
Ultimate kollywood Quiz is quiz game related to Tamil movie industry also called as kollywood. This game test user's knowledge based on multiple choice questions. Users has to tell only the answer from One to Four.

The Skill tells the is quiz game based on Tamil cinema. Four multiple choice is provided to about the question to user, they have to pick the correct one by saying from one to four.
 
If user want to hear the question again they may say 'Repeat' to replay, or say help to get the help, or stop to exit the game.

hundreds of tamil movie related questions are in the Database, is growing continuously.

Anytime you can say 'Help' to find the rule of the Ultimate Kollywood Quiz.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
